GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
scsi: mpt3sas: Fix possible resource leaks in mpt3sas_transport_port_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit ce1a69cc85006b494353911b35171da195d79e25, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit f92363d12359498f9a9960511de1a550f0ec41c2. For more details please see the references link.
